question:
DNA fingerprinting technology can be used for which of the following ?
  1. Criminal identification
  2. Maternity identification
  3. Identification of plant species
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation:
Lalji Singh, also known as father of DNA Fingerprinting in India, passed away on December 10, 2017. He is credited for bringing DNA fingerprinting to the mainstream technology in the country. The DNA Fingerprinting in the country is used for identification of an individual by examining their DNA. The DNA of each individual is composed of Bases [Adenine (A), Thymine (T), Guanine (G), and Cytosine (C)], Sugar and a Phosphate. Two bases link to each other using hydrogen bonds to form base pairs. The DNA Fingerprinting technology can be used for:
  • Criminal identification
  • Identification of paternity and maternity
  • Identification of mutilated remains
  • In forensic wildlife (Identification of plants and animals species)
